item.title: Dashboards in RStudio
item.description: This post will be about how to create a dashboard of visualizations in RStudio using dplyr, the Lahman database, ggplot2 for the visualizations, and flexdashboard for creating the dasboard. First letâ€™s load some packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(flexdashboard) The visualizations we want to put on a dashboard usually has to have something in common, and this is why we chose Babe Ruth to create this dashboard. First we need to extract the data I want for this visualization:
